alert.note: Alert for La Paz (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued June 26 at 11:51PM MST until June 27 at 2:00AM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 215 AM MST MONDAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...A portion of west central Arizona, including the following county, La Paz. * WHEN...Until 215 AM MST. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Washes running. Water over roadways. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1151 PM MST, Thunderstorms in the Advisory area have weakened but showers are lingering and keeping the minor flooding going. - This includes the following streams and drainages... Bouse Wash and Osborne Wash. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Bouse, Highway 72, and Highway 95 north of Quartzsite. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.
